oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Alessio, Francesco, 1921 January 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Francesco Alessio, October 22nd, 1900, witnessed on November 10th, 1914 by Joe Toso and Alex Colorigh. Illustrates the first page of the document, a translation in English; includes the original will by Alessio written in Italian, at a place known as Morny Community, Davidson County, Tennessee. Alessio’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on January 3rd, 1921. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alessio family
